short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transports users into the vibrant energy of a nighttime city, casting a retro-futuristic atmosphere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The background features a sleek, black sports car under glowing neon lights, reflecting off a wet street. Ideal for fans of high-speed aesthetics and neon city vibes, this theme immerses users in a cyberpunk-inspired environment. Bright reflections and saturated colors provide a dynamic, modern feel that captures the thrill of a late-night drive through a city alive with lights.

Key features:

- Beautiful car background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
